description: Make this homemade sushi with smoked salmon, cucumber and avocado. Serve it as an entree, or in a sushi platter complete with tuna sushi and chicken sushi.
name: Smoked Salmon Sushi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roll up using the bamboo mat, starting from the end with the fillings. Wet the uncovered strip at the far end and press to seal. Slice into 6 or 8 pieces. Place on a serving platter. Repeat with rice and fillings. Serve sushi with soy sauce and pickled ginger.
